dtliExcerpt: With a structure that takes fewer chances than one might hope, Harmony is nonetheless steadily compelling and not infrequently stirring, attributes that speak as much to the Manilow-Sussman craftsmanship as to an intriguing tale long-lost to history.

keyPhrases.quote: steadily compelling and not infrequently stirring
takes fewer chances than one might hope
speaks as much to the Manilow-Sussman craftsmanship
